data.title: Welcome to Lynn University
data.meta_description: Lynn University is a private Florida college located in Boca Raton that offers a broad range of degrees for undergraduate and graduate students.
data.text:
I chose Lynn for the softball program, class sizes, the block schedule, and the location! My major is a great first step for going to Law school after my undergraduate degree. I love playing softball, hanging out with my friends, going to the beach and any other athletic activity! After I graduate, I hope to go to law school and eventually become a divorce lawyer!

Madison Doherty '27

Ardsley, New York, Political Science

[email protected]

I chose Lynn because forensic investigations is a niche major that not many universities have and it's small class size. Outside of class, I enjoy doing yoga, Pilates and going to the beach with friends. After I graduate I want to pursue a career as a forensic analyst for the FBI.

Bianca Cain '25

Charlotte, North Carolina, Forensic Investigations

[email protected]

Music has been a huge part of my life since I was little, so finding a good conservatory was essential for me. The conservatory and faculty here at Lynn are amazing and are really helping me prepare for a career in music! Outside of the classroom, I enjoy swimming, drawing, and reading! After Lynn, I hope to pursue my master's degree and work towards getting a job in an orchestra!

Olivia Oakland '25

Boca Raton, Florida, Performance: Strings, Woodwinds, Brass, Harp & Percussion

[email protected]
